text:
Had a toothache and the Eunos branch suggested I come to the Geylang branch. It was super helpful of them to help me make a last minute appt and the Geylang branch called me directly to confirm. At first when they knew I may not make it at the indicated time slot, they even suggested to help me check with Aljunied branch. I‚Äôm impressed by their helpful and attentive service!
Turned out that I had gingivitis and needed an injection and gum treatment. Dr Wong is super experienced and I felt assured that I was in good hands and was at peace throughout the whole treatment process. The numbing cream helped to numb the sensation and I couldn‚Äôt feel the injection and the removal of infected gum tissue. The whole process was completed at around an hour.
Would greatly recommend Q&M for helping me!

Dr Reuben Goh attended to my recent dental treatments. Dr Reuben exhibited high level of knowledge, steady pair of hands and patience to all my questions for the multiple crowning works. He was assuring and worked with confidence.

Dr Reuben reflects very well for his professional work and your organization. Thank you for the successful dental treatment.

Great Dental surgery - good price and always attentive to details and not pushy but do tell you other things they could do to help your teeth/smile.   I have now been here 3 times.  One for a check up and clean and two to get poorly done filling in Melbourne, Australia- no charge second time I came back to get it fixed up more.  Good position as between Geylang and Aljunied.  Close to  Aljunied station.  Very clean surgery and  do a great clean of my teeth.  I had a small infection - gave me mouthwash to take home. Very nice people.  Thank you üôè

Dr Wong Fai Say provides excellent dental services. He is very gentle, patient and provided clear explanation along the way. As a patient who dreads paying a visit to the dentist, I must say the experience was very comfortable and pleasant. Would surely book a visit with him in future. Highly recommended.

Very helpful, we go to the nearest Q&M dental near my mom house, however they are full but the reception recommended to the nearest available dental as she saw that my mom really in pain. She book for us the earliest slot. Come to the lor 22 Geylang and the staff and the doctor is very helpful and nice and he advice me n my mom accordingly and they do the removal of wisdom tooth immediately and inform me the procedure. The doctor also advice my mom to consider another tooth to be removed next visit
